mean_cn: adj. 温文尔雅的，懂礼的；都【城】市气派的
mean_en: (especially of a man) good at knowing what to say and how to behave in social situations; appearing relaxed and confident
sentence: Their cocktail party conversation was sophisticated and urbane.
sentence_trans: 他们在鸡尾酒会上的谈话既老练又文雅。
word_etyma: urban城市的 ＋ e → 有城市人的风度 → urbane文雅的，有礼貌的
